triphalā candana utpalam cūrṇa śītalayā saha

original: kastūryā yaḥ pivet varṣa sabhavet nirjarārujaḥ ||
analyzed: kastūryā yaḥ pivet varṣa sabhavet nirjarārujaḥ

original: triphalā candanaṁ cūrṇa kastūryā saha sevayet |
analyzed: triphalā candanam kastūryā saha sevayet
ṣaṣ māva mātram sa sevyam dīrgha āyuḥ syāt sa rupavān
kastūrī triphalā yuktam
yat pivet satatam śītam sa bhavet nirjara arujaḥ
yat tasya jāyate siddhiḥ ipsitā na atra saśayaḥ

original: saṁpudodbhavasarvatantra nidāna mahākalparāja daśamaḥ sūtakagandhakaścaiva śaileyena samanvitaḥ |
analyzed: daśamaḥ sūtaka gandhakaḥ ca eva śaileyena samanvitaḥ
dhṛtena sa plavam kṛtvā yojayet sarva karmaṣu
atha taila vidhi vakṣe

original: nalinī ājyaṁ valā ājyaṁ tailaścaivacatusamaṁ ete samasamāyuktam |
analyzed: nalinī ājyam valā ājyam tailaḥ ca eva catur samam ete sama samāyuktam
asita haridrā kalkam ca

original: guḍucisāra samuddhṛtya gokṣīraścasamantata atha vibhāgaṁ kavayāmi me |
analyzed: samuddhṛtya go kṣīraḥ ca samantata atha vibhāgam me

original: cūrṇadvābhiśatpala gṛhya toyaṁ dviguṇāṁ tathā tāvat kvāṣayet yāvat sarāva catustaya |
analyzed: gṛhya toyam dviguṇām tathā tāvat kvāṣayet yāvat

original: yathānukrameṇa tailātcaturguṇāṁ kṣīraṁ guḍuci tad ardhasya ca etat ardha bhavet kalakaṁ purvoktaṁ dravyai saha ekīkṛtya pacet mṛdunā yadi atyayaṁ  #
analyzed: yathā anukrameṇa tailāt caturguṇām kṣīram guḍuci tad ardhasya ca etat ardha bhavet kalakam purva uktam dravyaiḥ saha ekīkṛtya pacet mṛdunā yadi atyayam
tadā madhyamam guḍucī vahi sthitām

original: nasye dvipañcakaṁ palaṁ pānena śatapalaṁ proktam |
analyzed: nasye dvi pañcakam palam pānena śata palam proktam

original: abhyage aṣṭotara śataṁ tathā kuryāt yogī susamāhitaḥ |
analyzed: abhyage aṣṭotara śatam tathā kuryāt yogī su samāhitaḥ

original: sahāstrārdha bhavet nasye peye pañcaśataṁ tathā |
analyzed: bhavet nasye peye pañca śatam tathā
śata trayam śirobhyage mama vākyam naśasayam
divya rupī bhavati su svaraḥ ca priyaḥ bhavet
nityam
sarva vighna nikṛntakaḥ

original: vākuci utpala sārilauha puriṣā gandhādu guggula sarjarasa karpūra mṛgajomada |
analyzed: vākuci utpala sārilauha puriṣā gandhādu guggula sarjarasa karpūra mṛgajomada
pacet tailam ārogya varddhanam
śirobhyage vali palita haram
sarva rogā apanayanam
bhavati eva naśasayam
atha uddhartana taila vidhi

original: tadevataila kintu raktāpahā kanakadumā ca dṛḍhaprarohā sindhuvārai saha prāg uktavidhinā mantrīprasādhayet toyam |
analyzed: kintu raktāpahā kanakadumā ca dṛḍhaprarohā sindhuvāraiḥ saha prāk ukta vidhinā toyam

original: tadanu śyāmā priyaṁgu keśarī vakula vilādharī nāga cakramardanī niśā avanikanaka,
analyzed: tadanu

original: śikhī pravarabhūtāni parahallabhā muktaka śaramañjarī hemataru ca vākuci dhanaṁ dāru sarvari |
analyzed: śikhī pravara bhūtāni para hallabhā muktaka śara mañjarī hemataru ca vākuci dhanam dāru sarvari

original: mañjaṣṭhā rogendra nāgavalā śveta sarvarogā panayanakārī candane dve mṛgamadaṁ karpūraṁ śallakī nakhadhūpa guḍa samāyukta sarvakāma prasādhaka
analyzed: candane dve mṛgamada karpūram śallakī nakha dhūpa guḍa samāyukta sarva kāma prasādhaka

original: kaṇḍū lutā vicarcikā aṁgajaṁ viṣaṁ sarva nāśayet |
analyzed: kaṇḍū lutā vicarcikā agajam viṣam nāśayet
mama vākyam naśasayam
kastūrī catu samam matam

original: corakotsunāsaha nāśa iti vividha roga kṛmīkuṣṭhaṁ viṣajodabhavam |
analyzed: nāśaḥ iti vividha roga kṛmī kuṣṭham
kim punarvākuci sahaḥ
